# PMPP

This file will become your README and also the index of your
documentation.

## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install PMPP in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure PMPP package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to PMPP
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/tripathysagar/PMPP):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/tripathysagar/PMPP.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/tripathysagar/PMPP)

``` sh
$ conda install -c tripathysagar PMPP
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/PMPP/)

``` sh
$ pip install PMPP
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/tripathysagar/PMPP)’s
[pages](https://tripathysagar.github.io/PMPP/). Additionally you can
find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/tripathysagar/PMPP) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/PMPP/) respectively.
